review: I bought this to replace my 2nd Gen Roku so that I could order HBO Now. In comparison to the Roku it has significantly more problems with crashing mid-program, and sometimes even jumping to the wrong episode of a show after it crashes. The design and interface is nice however, so I'll give it three stars. Hopefully forthcoming firmware updates can correct the crashing problem.
author: diane
